docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 24-- Lingering doubts about the practical value of a meeting of hemispheric leaders appear to have been resolved, and President Johnson now seems eager to attend.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 24-- Lingering doubts about the practical value of a meeting of hemispheric leaders appear to have been resolved, and President Johnson now seems eager to attend.
docs.abstract: Johnson now seen eager for conf, reptdly seeking Latin-Amer admiration and greater econ efforts; Linowitz and Gordon rept outlook good for arms-limitation pact

headline.main: Johnson Is Believed to Be Hopeful of Using Latin Summit Talks to Spur Regional Economic Integration

headline.main: Roster of the Winners of Individual and Team Championships During 1966; Roster of the Winners of Individual and Team Championships in the Sports World During 1966

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 25--One of President Johnson's key men in the Administration's resurgent diplomacy in Latin America is a 53-year-old lawyer who speaks little Spanish and knows little about Latin America.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 25--One of President Johnson's key men in the Administration's resurgent diplomacy in Latin America is a 53-year-old lawyer who speaks little Spanish and knows little about Latin America.
docs.abstract: Linowitz reptdly impressed Latin-Amers favorably; reptdly told Johnson of uneven quality of US reprs in area; speculation on his relations with Gordon

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 26 (AP) President-elect Oscar D. Gestido announced today his choices for the cabinet that will take over the Government with him on March 1.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 26 (AP) President-elect Oscar D. Gestido announced today his choices for the cabinet that will take over the Government with him on March 1.
